clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness of MBSR Among School Teachers
clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness of Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction Among Danish School Teachers

brief_summary.textblock: The aim is to evaluate the effectiveness of Mindfulness-Based Stress Reduction among school teachers in Danish schools on mental weii-being in the teachers and their pupils. The study is a cluster-randomised trial including 150 schools; 200 teachers; 4000 pupils from the five geographical regions in Denmark.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in perceived stress among the school teachers
primary_outcome.time_frame: post MBSR (8 weeks from baseline), 6 and 12 months from baseline

primary_outcome.measure: Change in resilience among the school teachers
primary_outcome.time_frame: post MBSR (8 weeks from baseline), 6 and 12 months from baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in symptoms of anxiety and depression among the school teachers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: post MBSR (8 weeks from baseline), 6 and 12 months from baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in well-being among the school teachers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: post MBSR (8 weeks from baseline), 6 and 12 months from baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in mindfulness among the school teachers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: post MBSR (8 weeks from baseline), 6 and 12 months from baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in resting state among the school teachers
secondary_outcome.time_frame: post MBSR (8 weeks from baseline), 6 and 12 months from baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in social capital among the pupils spending >5 hours with the teachers
Change in strengths and difficulties among the pupils spending >5 hours with the teachers
Change in well-being among the pupils spending >5 hours with the teachers

arm_group.description: MBSR according to international standards (2.5 hours group session once a week in 8 weeks; a silence retreat day; and 45-60 minutes homework six days a week). Content in accordance with MBSR curriculum.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- School teacher at a Danish school that commit to participate in a trial aiming to implement and evaluate the effectiveness of ".b" (a school-based mindfulness programme)
Exclusion Criteria:
- acute treatment-demanding clinical depression or a diagnosis of psychosis or schizophrenia
- abuse of alcohol, drugs, medicine

overall_official.affiliation: Aarhus University, Danish Center for Mindfulness
